name: Sokobos - Aphrodite's Trial
description:
NEW TRAGEDY

Aphrodite's Trial introduces a new tragic story with a fresh cast of 4 characters. Corinna and Nikephoros are seeking Aphrodite's blessing so they may get married. The goddess asks them to prove the strength of their bond. What will go wrong?

NEW PUZZLE ELEMENTS

Experience new elements before unseen in Sokobos that are inspired by real history. When combined together with the Sokobos' original gameplay, you'll have to find a whole new approach to solve puzzles.

30 NEW LEVELS

Experience all of the above neatly packed in 30 new challenging levels.
